*** Preparations ***

```{r}

# specific visualisation
```

Load data
```{r}
rpath <- "../R EDA - Restaurant Forecasting/data/"

air_visits <- read_csv(str_c(rpath, "air_visit_data.csv.zip"), col_types = cols())
```
